title: MY PROBLEM WITH RECENT TOTAL WAR GAMES...
description:
The Problem With Recent Total War Games - Hey guys this is just a small video I put together explaining the issues I have about the newer total war games.  Let me makes this clear that I love the new games, I just feel like they are losing some of their magic.  I go over a few major topics that I hope I see changed.  Enjoy the video and be sure to leave a comment :D

POM video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WXPM2P2ChOk&feature=share

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
